data.name: The Caligula Effect 2 - Set of 3 Stigmas
data.detailed_description:
3 Stigmas
[★Courageous Coward]
・Attack +80, Critical +3

[★Mobius Strip]
・Grants [★Ideal World](【Rank 5】SP Regen (LV3))

[★Uncanny Empathy]
・Grants [★Acumen](【Rank 5】Skill Mastery Gain +300%)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) 2 Duo E8400 @ 3.00GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or AMD Radeon HD 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i3-4340 CPU @ 3.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 750Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
